EPA closes a plant ‚Äúin a community that has historically been disproportionately impacted by environmental contamination,‚Äù failing to mention that the community has also been disproportionately impacted by 32.1% unemployment. Geneva Energy hasn‚Äôt operated the tire incinerator in Ford Heights since August 2011, according to court documents. (Terrence Antonio James, Chicago Tribune) The EPA recently shut down a Geneva Energy plant in Ford Heights, Illinois. It was too dirty. The EPA reported, via American Energy Alliance: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency has reached agreement with Geneva Energy, LLC on the terms of a consent decree to resolve allegations that the company violated the Clean Air Act at a tire-burning electric generating plant in Ford Heights, Illinois. Geneva has agreed to close the facility, which operated intermittently from 2006 until the fall of 2011. Advertisement - story continues below A federal lawsuit was filed at the same time as the settlement and alleges violations included in an August 2010 EPA Notice and Finding of Violation issued to the facility. The NOV/FOV alleged violations of the facility‚Äôs construction permit, including monitoring and reporting requirements and emission limits established for carbon monoxide, nitrogen oxide, sulfur dioxide, ammonia, particulate matter, and opacity. ‚ÄúThis settlement will eliminate the source of almost 200 tons of air pollutants each year, in a community that has historically been disproportionately impacted by environmental contamination,‚Äù said EPA Regional Administrator Susan Hedman. Advertisement James Baker Rep. Doug Collins (R-GA) on Wednesday released transcript of former FBI counsel James Baker‚Äôs second interview with the House Judiciary Committee. James Baker gave two explosive testimonies to the House Judiciary Committee in October of 2018 in an unclassified setting. Advertisement - story continues below According to the newly released transcript, James Baker refused to answer when Congressman Mark Meadows asked if multiple Trump associates (besides Carter Page) were spied on with FISA warrants. It is believed that Obama‚Äôs corrupt DOJ and FBI obtained FISA warrants on General Mike Flynn, Paul Manafort and George Papadopoulos, however it has not been confirmed. TRENDING: Kentucky Health Care Workers Refused to Comply With Vaccine Mandate, Forced Hospital to Fire Them (VIDEOS) Baker‚Äôs refusal to answer Meadows suggests that Obama‚Äôs FBI and DOJ indeed spied on Flynn and others with FISA warrants. Meadows wanted to know how many FISA warrants related to Russia collusion that James Baker reviewed as it related to the probable cause portion. Advertisement - story continues below ‚ÄúHow many FISA applications did you review as it relates to Russia?‚Äù Meadows asked Baker. FBI lawyers interjected and wouldn‚Äôt let Baker answer, claiming the information is ‚Äúsensitive‚Äù and ‚Äúalmost always classified.‚Äù Meadows continued to push back. ‚ÄúWell, there was a text message in a nonclassified setting that would indicate that there were multiple FISA applications, as many as 17 different FISA applications that may or may not have related to this particular subject,‚Äù Meadows said, adding, ‚ÄúWould it surprise you to know that there were ‚Äî or is there more FISA applications beyond just the Carter Page FISA application that we‚Äôve been discussing as it relates to this investigation?‚Äù An FBI lawyer interjected and would not let James Baker answer Meadows‚Äôs questions on the FISA applications. Advertisement - story continues below Meadows continued, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs multiple texts. There‚Äôs multiple texts that would indicate Lisa Page ‚Äî it‚Äôs in a text message between Lisa Page and Andy McCabe that says, you know, your particular ‚Äî I can read it. Would you like me to read it?‚Äù Meadows was referring to a text exchange between Lisa Page and Andrew McCabe that took place on October 19th, 2016, just two days before the first FISA warrant was opened on Carter Page. ‚ÄúThere will be nine packages for you to sign, with the possibility of eight additional if the NSLB signs off on them. They‚Äôll probably won‚Äôt be WUDsd (ph) by 7:30. The FISA team will be delivering them at 7.‚Äù Lisa Page said in a text to McCabe. ‚ÄúWere there multiple FISA applications?‚Äù Meadows asked after reading Lisa Page‚Äôs October 2016 text to McCabe. Advertisement - story continues below ‚ÄúWere there other individuals connected directly or indirectly with the Trump campaign that had a FISA warrant placed on them for the purpose of surveilling conversations and collecting data other than Carter Page that you‚Äôre aware of?‚Äù Meadows asked again. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not going to answer it right now,‚Äù Baker responded. An FBI lawyer [name redacted] objected to Meadows‚Äôs question and promised to follow up with the Republican lawmaker perhaps in a classified setting. Obama‚Äôs corrupt FBI and DOJ obtained one FISA warrant and three subsequent renewals (4 total) on Trump campaign advisor Carter Page. The final FISA warrant was signed in June of 2017 by DAG Rod Rosenstein and Andrew McCabe AFTER Mueller was appointed special counsel to investigate Trump-Russia collusion. Baker‚Äôs refusal to answer Meadows strongly suggests others in Trump‚Äôs orbit were also spied on with FISA warrants ‚Äî this is one of the biggest scandals in US history and all roads lead back to Obama and Hillary Clinton.
